name: Kurt Michael DANYSH, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; Cindy Walsavage, Inmate Accounting Assistant I; Robert Shannon, Superintendent of the State Correctional Institution at Frackville, Appellees

parties: Kurt Michael DANYSH, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; Cindy Walsavage, Inmate Accounting Assistant I; Robert Shannon, Superintendent of the State Correctional Institution at Frackville, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of September, 2005, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
881 A.2d 1263
Kurt Michael DANYSH, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; Cindy Walsavage, Inmate Accounting Assistant I; Robert Shannon, Superintendent of the State Correctional Institution at Frackville, Appellees.

Sept. 28, 2005.
